backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend components and configuration files.
frontend/docs/landing-customization.md: Documentation explaining how to customize the landing page and update the fixed APK link.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions with dark-mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the LandingPage with theme and React Query providers using a forced dark theme.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Empty placeholder file for an admin panel component.
frontend/src/components/landing/download: Provides the fixed Google Drive APK download URL and a handler that opens it in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/landing/effects/: Mouse‑tracking glow effect that appears only on hover-capable devices.
frontend/src/components/landing/GlassPan: Reusable glass panel component with optional strong variant.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Flo: Empty placeholder file for floating mockup visuals.
frontend/src/components/landing/hero/Her: Canvas-based animated particle background with reduced particles and subtle aura.
frontend/src/components/landing/landingC: Centralized configuration for landing page CTAs using the fixed APK URL.
Centralized text copy for all landing sections with no image references.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Assembles all landing sections into a single scrollable page with a cursor glow effect.
frontend/src/components/landing/Responsi: Responsive layout wrapper providing standardized max-width and padding.
Section wrapper with scroll‑reveal animation triggered via IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: Minimal text-centered section rendering the main and sub cult lines.
Final CTA section with a download button wired to the fixed APK link and a footer.
Empty placeholder for the “For Who” section.
Renders the hero section with background, tagline, and primary/secondary CTAs including APK download and smooth scroll.
Displays animated psychological lines triggered by intersection observer as the user scrolls.
Shows social proof text lines pulled from landing copy inside a centered section.
Renders a three-column grid describing what the product does using static landing copy blocks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Computes a parallax offset based on scroll position using throttled scroll events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file noting no backend queries exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Uses intersection observer to reveal elements once they enter view.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, utility classes, animations, and glass/CTA styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, spacing, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state and design requirements for a premium black minimalist KARM landing page using a fixed APK link and no images/mockups. Includes aesthetic rules, motion guidelines, known issues, and a list of existing features and requirements.
